programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 He Said He Said Fight
programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face. Officers struggle to control an outrageous man. Officers attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a woman's things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police are in a high-speed chase with a car missing a tire. Police respond when a tow truck driver is assaulted by an apartment manager. Police are called when a relative attacks a woman’s husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers question a couple looking to score. Officers respond to a domestic violence call in which it is unclear what exactly transpired. Officers assist on a shots fired call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A group of suspects race a stolen SUV through a residential neighborhood. A drunk man has a kitchen knife and a listening problem. Two usual suspects are going back to jail for their latest escapades.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a truck with a trailer full of golf carts. Police question a driver after finding a mask and handgun in his car. Officers are called to a traffic collision involving a semi and an SUV.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E21 Don't Make her Angry
programme.desc: A man needs police assistance when his angry ex-girlfriend crawls through his window. Police must play hide-and-seek when they attempt to execute an arrest warrant. A man is threatened with violence when he refuses to turn his car’s headlights off.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer is attacked while attempting to break up a fight. Officers confiscate marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A man is arrested for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E18 Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: A man takes off from officers when they roll up on a notorious hotspot for dealers. Cops surprise a jaywalker when they find some suspicious items in his supposedly borrowed jacket. A woman takes the heat for her beau when meth is found in their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A homeowner shoots at intruders only he can see. The driver of a stolen truck claims he’s just trying to return the vehicle to a friend. A argument about parenting styles turns ugly when a gun is pulled.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E26 Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A jaywalker darts on a mad dash through the weeds. Things go badly for a suspect on a stolen motorcycle when choppers help officers track him down. A domestic dispute leads cops to a slew of unexpected crimes.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers intercept a drunk female driver using a PIT maneuver. A routine traffic stop results in an arrest after officers discover a concealed weapon as well as drugs. An officer makes an arrest after pulling over a vehicle transporting a sizable bag of marijuana.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E20 A Bag, a Bus and a Break In
programme.desc: A couple calls for help when a man breaks into their home. A school bus is involved in a hit and run accident. Officer find a one gallon bag of contraband in a suspect’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man tells deputies the pants he has on aren’t his. Officers are called to the scene of men firing an AK-47. A nervous driver fesses up to the deputy who stopped him.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Instead of facing the music, a suspect flees from officers down an embankment. A suspect takes a walk through the neighborhood with a BB gun. A innocent pedestrian gets more than she bargained for when she’s hit in a two vehicle collision.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from police claiming he heard a gunshot. A woman lays the blame on her boyfriend. Officers confront a man who refuses to come down from a roof.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Rather than stop, a driver decides to lead police on a high-speed chase. A woman is shot at by her ‘sugar daddy.’ A fleeing suspect dumps a suspicious liquid out of his window.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue an SUV on the freeway. Deputies are called after an agitated man arms himself with scissors. A driver tells officers the illegal items found in his car was left by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Cops are forced to take desperate measures when an unruly suspect won’t stop fighting. Officers have to contain a man looking to flee with crack. Police know a tearful driver has weed in the car when he refuses to open his glove box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An assailant attacks a woman after bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on a cameraman’s equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a traffic accident after a man runs his truck through a wall. An undercover officer poses as a “john” and later a vehicle is stopped due to a missing license plate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E04 Settled with a Pipe
programme.desc: A man attacking a woman is tackled by an officer. A vehicle is pulled over for a drug deal in progress. A woman smashes a car window with a pipe in a fit of road rage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police pursue a driver who ran a stop sign. A suspect wearing a D.A.R.E. T-shirt is found to be in possession of drugs. A woman claims the drugs found in the vehicle she’s sleeping in are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E06 The House Always Wins
programme.desc: A suspect runs from an illegal gambling game claiming shots were fired. A man is caught trespassing on school grounds. A male driver wearing a halter top is pulled over for a minor traffic violation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E24 Copy of Breaking Home Barriers
programme.desc: Officers respond after two men kick in a woman's door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. An officer arrests a husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers recover a small bag of drugs from a crying suspect. A drunk woman hides a second ID in her back pocket. Police stop a vehicle that hit a patrol car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing suspect takes officers on a wild chase through oncoming traffic. Surveillance footage of a stabbing helps police find the vicious attacker. Cops track a subject into an uncooperative stranger’s apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffice stop, an officer witnesses a cyclist get hit by a motorist. An officer investigates a domestic disturbance call involving some spousal infidelity. Authorities respond to a tip regarding a heavy weight drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on the corner is questioned when he’s wearing gang colors in a gang neighborhood. A muscle car spins its tires at a stop light. A woman’s neighbor steals her ‘special’ plants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer wrestles a squirrely meth user who thinks he’s the Incredible Hulk. Cops catch a drug-carrying sprinter when he runs out of gas. A belligerent suspect doesn’t take kindly to having his socks removed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer pulls over an erratic driver while on the way to a shots fired call. An officer attempts to stop a resistant motorcyclist. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving an intoxicated man and a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E09 Guns, Hash, and Fire Hydrants
programme.desc: A chase becomes a flash flood when a fleeing driver runs into a fire hydrant. An insolent domestic violence suspect claims his girlfriend is a habitual 9-1-1 caller. Officers recover a cornucopia of contraband from a gun-toting couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman tells Officers she’s a vampire. Officers question a colorful man dressed as a woman. A violent woman screams obscenities at Officers and needs to be restrained.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E32 I Always Pay My Debts
programme.desc: A man tries to bite an officer after narcotics are spotted in his mouth. Officers respond to a family fighting in their front yard. A suspect claims to be repaying a debt when he's caught buying drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man who ran from police complains that he was not read his rights. Officers detain kids who threw rocks at windowfronts. A paranoid man claims he is being chased by drug dealers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist an off-duty deputy being followed by a vehicle trying to force him off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her cheating husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when signaled to stop. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1986
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1986 introduced us to Samantha Fox, Sinitta & Sigue Sigue Sputnik. But we also said a 'Final' goodbye to Wham!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1987
programme.desc: Jenny Powell flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1987 had 'No Limits' on the TV & Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranking an endless stream of massive, catchy hits!

programme.title: 1987's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1987 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Taffy, Westworld, Karel Fialka or Morris Minor & The Majors?

programme.title: 1987 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!

programme.title: Rick Astley's Hit Factory & Beyond
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Rick Astley's Hit Factory & Beyond
programme.desc: Rick's here, not just with Stock, Aitken & Waterman's big stars like Kylie and Jason, but with other massive 80s bangers that influenced the brilliant Hit Factory sound. Jump in!

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: 80s - To The Max!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping

programme.title: Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!
programme.desc: Your eighties party channel - 24/7. Expect synth pop, soft rock, leg warmers, lycra and lots of big hair! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.

programme.title: Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.desc: All killer - no filler! The anthems that made a decade - from Madonna to Prince, Michael to George, Duran Duran to Pet Shop Boys.

programme.title: The 80s (What A Feeling!)
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.desc: All killer - no filler! The anthems that made a decade - from Madonna to Prince, Michael to George, Duran Duran to Pet Shop Boys.

programme.title: Bring Out The 80s!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s -24/7. With synth pop, soft rock, leg warmers, lycra and big hair! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.

programme.title: 80s Hit After 80s Hit!
programme.desc: Your 80s channel - 24/7!

programme.title: NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.desc: 5 hours of flashbacks from the swinging 60s! Including Johnny Cash, Sam Cooke, The Kinks, Lulu, The Beach Boys, The Beatles, The Troggs, Bob Dylan, The Rolling Stones & Elvis.

programme.title: Essential 70s - The No 2s
programme.desc: Can you believe none of these songs reached no.1? Enjoy 6 hours of runners-up, in order, that didn't quite have what it takes. From Elvis in 1970 to Abba in 1979.

programme.title: Spring Has Sprung!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Surely Not A Cover?!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Pat Sharp's Surely Not A Cover?!
programme.desc: In year order - Pat's list of 30 classic 70s anthems that were all covers. Including Rod Stewart, The Clash, Manfred Mann, John Lennon, Shirley Bassey & The Wurzels!

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Folk Rock
programme.desc: 2 hours of superbly crafted songs inspired by different regions of the world. Including Simon & Garfunkel, Cat Stevens, James Taylor, Janice Joplin, Bob Dylan & Neil Young.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's SingerSongwriters
programme.desc: From Joni Mitchell to Judie Tzuke, Al Green to Elton John - the 70s was a classic decade for singer-songwriters who have stood the test of time. Tony Blackburn chooses the tunes.

programme.title: Disco Bling! Top 25
programme.desc: 25 of the campest & glitziest disco videos known to man. Sunglasses at the ready cause you'll be blinded by the bright lights & brilliant bling!

programme.title: NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.desc: 5 hours of flashbacks from the swinging 60s! Including Johnny Cash, Sam Cooke, The Kinks, Lulu, The Beach Boys, The Beatles, The Troggs, Bob Dylan, The Rolling Stones & Elvis.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's SingerSongwriters
programme.desc: From Joni Mitchell to Judie Tzuke, Al Green to Elton John - the 70s was a classic decade for singer-songwriters who have stood the test of time. Tony Blackburn chooses the tunes.

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: 1976 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1976!

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's SingerSongwriters
programme.desc: From Joni Mitchell to Judie Tzuke, Al Green to Elton John - the 70s was a classic decade for singer-songwriters who have stood the test of time. Tony Blackburn chooses the tunes.

programme.title: 1976 Unleashed!

programme.title: The Hit Songs of Grease!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Hit Songs of Grease!
programme.desc: All 7 music videos & the theme song from the 1978 movie in order - you know the story, and we're all hopelessly devoted to the tunes! They'll go by like Greased Lightnin'!

programme.title: 1970 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1970!

programme.title: Flares & Floorfillers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Mmm, sniff that heady waft of Brut mixed with cheap perfume as you hit a dancefloor for our playlist of top bops in your cheesecloth shirt or nylon blouse. Make mine a Babycham!

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The NOW 100 of the 70s
programme.desc: Exclusive to NOW 70s, Mark Goodier brings this marathon 100 countdown of the decade's biggest acts, based on global record sales, live concert takings, and awards. So who's no.1?

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to make a variety of homemade spice blends and tackles a challenge with a monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem: less waste, more food, and more nutrition.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy with recipes that bring warmth, flavor and joy to the kitchen on the coldest winter days.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: Learn Frankie’s techniques and tricks for making your favorite egg dishes just the way you like them.

programme.title: Let's Start From the Top!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: We're kicking things off with the 90s. No, not the decade, but the meals!

programme.title: Mints are not on the List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: Things really start to heat up as our panel discuss the latest ranked selections.

programme.title: This Sandwich is Defying Gravity
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: What meals rank in the 70s and how are they related to disco? Let's find out!

programme.title: Old Bay and Old Spice Don't Mix
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: Things get contemptuous as our panel argues over a dish in the 60s. There is no right or wrong, we all win!

programme.title: A Favorite of Youngins and Felons Alike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: You may not agree with some meals on this episode... but that's okay, because the panel agrees with you!

programme.title: Baja Breaking all the Rules
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: We're halfway through our list, but somehow just getting started!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: Our panel continues to disagree with each other in this episode... which makes for good TV!

programme.title: Worthy of the Meat Sweats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: You will be surprised by at least ONE of the meals in this episode. Which will it be?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Forking Delicious: 100 Iconic Dishes
programme.desc: Coming down to the wire, what meals are going to make the cut?

programme.title: No Sleep Til Brooklyn

programme.title: Traditional Fish Fry

programme.title: Jerkin' and GRILLIN'
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is grillin’ and chillin’ serving up his favorite Jamaican dishes for his two friends.

programme.desc: Whitney Cummings & Miranda Cosgrove go head-to-head in the attempt to recreate our Tiny Spaghetti & Meatballs.

programme.desc: Jennifer Tilly & Devon Sawa bring in Halloween horror as they recreate our Tiny Pumpkin Pie.

programme.desc: Don’t miss the Beverly Hills ladies who brunch as Tori Spelling & Teddi Mellencamp make Tiny French Toasts.

programme.title: Ryan Hansen & Jimmy O. Yang make Tiny Cake Pops
programme.desc: Monica’s bestie Ryan Hansen & his bud Jimmy O. Yang make Tiny Cake Pops.

programme.title: Masterful Mash-ups
programme.desc: These recipes are a certified hit at Chef Kristen’s Austin Restaurant, Arlo Grey.

programme.title: Grilling Chicken like a Villain
programme.desc: Have you ever made a dish endless times but it never seems to get old? This is one of them for Chef Tiffani!

programme.title: No Kitchen No Problem
programme.desc: Frankie shows us easy and inventive “no-kitchen” hacks for delicious struggly meals. No Kitchen? No problem.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Learn how to make some inventive, flavorful mushroom dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to make a variety of homemade spice blends and tackles a challenge with a monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem: less waste, more food, and more nutrition.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy with recipes that bring warmth, flavor and joy to the kitchen on the coldest winter days.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: Learn Frankie’s techniques and tricks for making your favorite egg dishes just the way you like them.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie shows us that vintage doesn’t have to break the bank with these classic, oldie-but-goodie recipes.

programme.title: Yacht Rockin’ Kabobs
programme.desc: Chef Eduardo invokes his memories from Turkey and makes mouthwatering dishes with lamb, eggplant and salad.

programme.title: Date Night Duck
programme.desc: Surprise your beau with this romantic dinner created by the very talented Chef Shirly Chung.

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: Discover Frankie's secrets to cook nutritious and cost-effective one-pot hotdishes.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25 and shows us how to prep some fan-favorite finger foods.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: It’s the dead of winter in Frankie’s kitchen, which means it’s that time for hearty, delicious, warming meals.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentine’s Day dinner for under $15 with a bistro-style theme to up the romance.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season
programme.desc: Chef Derrell makes a holiday dinner fit for Royals or fancy family guests with crown roast and potato gratin.

programme.title: Burgers and Shakes
programme.desc: Burgers, shakes and tater tots are bringing back childhood memories and diner favorites for Chef Derrell.

programme.title: Bananas For Bananas
programme.desc: Frankie is saving bunches of money as he whips up these recipes featuring the most affordable of fruits.

programme.title: Cry Me An Allium River
programme.desc: There will be tears as Frankie goes head to head with his long time frenemy, the onion.

programme.title: One Night in Bangkok to fall in love with Pad Gra Pow
programme.desc: Chef Tiffani recreates the flavors that made her fall in love with Thai food for the first time.

programme.title: Date Night Duck

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: Discover Frankie's secrets to cook nutritious and cost-effective one-pot hotdishes.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25 and shows us how to prep some fan-favorite finger foods.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: It’s the dead of winter in Frankie’s kitchen, which means it’s that time for hearty, delicious, warming meals.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentine’s Day dinner for under $15 with a bistro-style theme to up the romance.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: More Stuff than Greens Salad
programme.desc: Chef Kristen’s version of the perfect salad - more stuff than greens!

programme.desc: Join Chef Tiffani as she shares the crazy story behind her special dish, Monkfish Piccata with Fennel & Onion.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Food Fact Fun Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Taipei, Alex visits major attractions such as Modern Toilet Restaurant, Chiang Kai Shek memorial hall, Longshan Temple and Taipei 101.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Our host travels to Sintra, known for its castles and palaces. Learning and exploring about castles, he further travels to the historic town Obidos.

programme.title: Xplore Thailand
programme.desc: At the Safari World in Thailand, Elisha has the experience of a lifetime when a tiger baby snuggles into her arm and she gets a chance to feed him.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In the rugged heart of the Peruvian Andes, Milagros sets out on an exhilarating adventure in Huascaran National Park.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Costa Rica Calling San Jose
programme.desc: Guided by her love of coffee, Genevieve ventures into the heart of Heredia, a lush coffee-growing region.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once a fishing village and now a mega town full of sky scrapers and modern high rise buildings. Welcome to the biggest emirate of the United Arab Emirates - Dubai.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Food Fact Fun Taichung, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex experiences offbeat attractions such as Wuwei Tea House, 921 Museum, Miyahara dessert parlour, National Taichung Theater, Rainbow village and Sun Cake Museum.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: Xplore Thailand
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Thailand Koh Samui
programme.desc: How would you react if you saw a man who has scorpions all over his face? Elisha finds herself face to face with one at Koh Samui in Thailand.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Dramatic views of the Pacific Ocean, brightly colored colonial buildings, world-class cuisine – the capital city of Peru, Lima has a lot going for it. Milagros reveals the treasures of her home city from the diverse neighborhoods, like the upscale Miraflores to the bohemian Barranco. She also shows a side of Lima where one can enjoy fun adventures with the marine creatures.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Costa Rica Calling Heredia
programme.desc: Genevieve's adventures in Costa Rica begin in the capital city, San José, where she marks some Costa Rican initiation rites.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses, Thailand
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Food Fact Fun Tainan, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Tainan, Alex tries local delicacies, visits Sun Moon Lake, Taiwanese Aboriginal Culture Village, Yanshui Catholic church, Ten Drum creative park and goes paragliding.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.title: Xplore Thailand
programme.desc: While boating in the emerald waters of the Phang Nga Bay, Elisha has an out-of-the-world experience when she chances upon secret lagoons and caves.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey, Milagros goes to Trujillo, where she introduces the flavors of the northern region of Peru and also Marinera – the sensuous national dance. But the highlight in Trujillo are the forgotten sites like Chan Chan and Huaca del Moche, where secrets from Peru’s pre-Incan past begin to unfold.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Costa Rica Calling Chilamate
programme.desc: In the heart of the Costa Rican countryside, Genevieve embarks on a cultural immersion journey in Chilamate.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Moeen, a travel enthusiast, goes for a short getaway to the Closenberg Hotel in Galle, an 18th century Dutch walled town in Sri Lanka with grand colonial houses and beautiful beaches. At the resort, he chances upon a traditional Sri Lankan wedding, which offers him a glimpse of the country’s traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Food Fact Fun Yilan, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex explores Yilan starting from Xing-Yuan tea farm, then visits Farmers’ Market, tries a duck delicacy. Further he visits a Museum, a Whiskey Distillery, National Centre for Traditional Arts, enjoys a high speed train ride and treks up to experience the beauty of a waterfall.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack Duoro Valley, Portugal
programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: Xplore India
programme.desc: Aradhana embarks on an adventure to find out the hidden wonders of a land steeped in spirituality and untamed wilderness: Chhattisgarh!

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Costa Rica Calling Rincon de la Vieja
programme.desc: Costa Rica is home to nearly 30 national parks and Genevieve sets out to explore one of them, Rincón de la Vieja.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Heritage_Buddhist Monuments in India
programme.desc: The rise of Buddhism in India can be traced from famous monuments such as the Mahabodhi temple complex and the Great Stupa at Sanchi.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Food Fact Fun New Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In New Taipei Alex explores the fish, market San Domingo fort, the Gold museum, New Taipei Yingge Ceramics Museum and at last he ends his journey with letting off a sky lantern at Jiufen village.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Xplore India
programme.desc: As Aradhana’s journey in Chhattisgarh continues, she is stunned to discover the wealth of natural beauty that the state has to offer.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By The Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Costa Rica Calling Guanacaste
programme.desc: Genevieve is drawn to Costa Rica's stunning Guanacaste region for its promise of exciting aquatic adventures.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Spas Evason Ma'in, Jordan
programme.desc: At the Evason Ma'In Resort in Jordan, Jamie tries out Srubis Spa treatments which harness the healing properties of the nearby Hammamat Ma'In hot springs.

programme.title: Xplore India
programme.desc: On the last leg of her journey in Chhattisgarh, Aradhana uncovers the hidden world of the state’s artistic legacy.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Costa Rica Calling Puntarenas
programme.desc: Venturing deeper into Puntarenas, Genevieve seeks an adrenaline rush in the lush embrace of Monteverde.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at Earl’s Regency, exploring its spiritual and cultural aspects. She visits a wildlife sanctuary, tries traditional meal and ending with exploring the surroundings of Kandy lake.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: Xplore India
programme.desc: On the last leg of her journey in Chhattisgarh, Aradhana uncovers the hidden world of the state’s artistic legacy.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Costa Rica Calling Puntarenas
programme.desc: Venturing deeper into Puntarenas, Genevieve seeks an adrenaline rush in the lush embrace of Monteverde.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at Earl’s Regency, exploring its spiritual and cultural aspects. She visits a wildlife sanctuary, tries traditional meal and ending with exploring the surroundings of Kandy lake.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.
